```{r setup}
library(Aerith)
```

### Summarize SIP percent for PSMs

```{r}
demo_file <- system.file("extdata", "demo.psm.txt", package = "Aerith")
summaryStats <- summaryPSMsipPCT(demo_file)
print(summaryStats)
```

### Plot the distribution of SIP percent for PSMs

```{r}
demo_file <- system.file("extdata", "demo.psm.txt", package = "Aerith")
p <- plotPSMsipPCT(demo_file)
p
```
